faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Origin Food House

setup.question: How long does setup take?
setup.answer: Most restaurants are up and running within 24-48 hours. Our team guides you through menu upload, QR code generation, and staff onboarding.

hardware.question: Do I need special hardware?
hardware.answer: No special hardware required! The system works on any device with a web browser. Guests use their own phones for ordering, and staff can use tablets, phones, or computers for the dashboard.

languages.question: What languages are supported?
languages.answer: The platform supports English, Chinese, Myanmar, and Thai. Menus can be translated into all four languages, perfect for international locations.

pricing.question: Are there any hidden fees?
pricing.answer: No hidden fees. Our pricing is transparent - you pay a fixed monthly subscription based on your tier. No transaction fees, no payment processing fees, no surprise charges.

support.question: What kind of support do you offer?
support.answer: All plans include email support. Growth plans get priority support with 4-hour response time. Enterprise customers get a dedicated account manager and phone support.

integration.question: Can I integrate with my existing systems?
integration.answer: Yes! Enterprise plans include custom API access and integrations. We can connect to your existing POS, accounting software, or inventory systems.

training.question: Do you provide staff training?
training.answer: Yes! All plans include documentation and video tutorials. Enterprise customers get personalized on-site or virtual training sessions for your entire team.

trial.question: Is there a free trial?
trial.answer: Yes! All plans include a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required to start your trial.
